overview: After surviving the apocalypse, David and Joseph, a gay couple, find themselves struggling to stay alive. As the days grow colder, David and Joseph start to realize that in order to survive in a world without society, they might not be able to hold onto what they once were. When given the choice, what do you hold onto: your morals or each other?
tagline: When given the choice, what do you hold onto: your morals or each other?
title: Together (short)
